title: Tough Sunrises
content:
Tough Sunrises Uncommon 2~9 Damage 1d8+1Piercing Weapon Enchantment +1 Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal Bludgeoning damage anyway. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Sent by Lathander, the god of creativity and sunrises. Unfortunately, it was not received by the cleric who needed it at that crucial moment, but by a baffled librarian in Daggerford. who used it as a door stopper. Morningstar 1.8 100
